item.title: [unf] Haberthrasher
item.description:
Creature — Human Hatificer Assassin

Deathtouch

Whenever another creature that has a hat enters the battlefield under your control or a hat sticker is put on a creature you control, each opponent loses 1 life.

item.title: [unf] Fight the _____ Fight
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature you control

When this Aura enters the battlefield, you may put a name sticker on it. When you do, enchanted creature fights up to one target creature you don't control.

Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 for each name sticker on this Aura with eight or more letters.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OZP2d92HmXo

item.title: [unf] Complaints Clerk
item.description:
Creature — Beast Employee

When Complaints Clerk enters the battlefield, open an Attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)

Whenever you roll a 1, create a 1/1 white Clown Robot artifact creature token.

https://twitter.com/MissMariapants/status/1574163795441848322

item.title: [unf] Pick-a-Beeble
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Roll a six-sided die. Put a number of luck counters on Pick-a-Beeble equal to the result and create a Treasure token. Then if there are six or more luck counters on Pick-a-Beeble, claim the prize!

Prize — Create two Treasure tokens, then sacrifice Pick-a-Beeble and open an Attraction.

https://twitter.com/MissMariapants/status/1574163795441848322

item.title: [unf] Dee Kay, Finder of the Lost
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Zombie Employee

When Dee Kay, Finder of the Lost enters the battlefield, open an Attraction.

Whenever you roll a d2, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Whenever you roll a 4, you may tap or untap target creature.

Whenever you roll a 6, return target creature from your graveyard to your hand.

https://twitter.com/infrecuentes/status/1573638554248421377

item.title: [unf] Squirrel Squatters
item.description:
Creature — Squirrel

When Squirrel Squatters enters the battlefield, open an Attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)

Whenever Squirrel Squatters attacks, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token that's tapped and attacking for each Attraction you've visited this turn.

https://twitter.com/infrecuentes/status/1573659480449028100

item.title: [unf] Trigger Happy
item.description:
Instant

Choose a triggered ability of target permanent. It triggers. You control that ability.

https://twitter.com/infrecuentes/status/1573689588161413121

item.title: [unf] Tchotchke Elemental
item.description:
Creature — Elemental

Whenever you create a token or put a counter or a sticker on another permanent, put a knickknack counter on Tchotchke Elemental. Use a unique item that completely fits on Tchotchke Elemental for each knickknack counter.

Tchotchke Elemental gets +1/+1 for each knickknack counter on it.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xJ3-j9UvBZs

item.title: [unf] Lineprancers
item.description:
Creature — Centaur Performers

When Lineprancers enters the battlefield, you get {TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a power and toughness sticker on a creature you own.

{3}{G}: Target creature you don't control blocks target creature you control with a power and toughness sticker on it other than Lineprancers this turn if able.

https://twitter.com/infrecuentes/status/1573702860767985667

item.title: [unf] Pie-Eating Contest
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, gobble X. (Each time you gobble, take a bit of food or sacrifice a Food token.)

X target creatures you control each get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

https://twitter.com/TappyToeClaws/status/1573736042913488897

item.title: [unf] Fluros of Myra's Marvels
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Merfolk Performer

As Fluros of Myra's Marvels enters the battlefield, choose a number greater than 0.

Whenever you cast a spell with power, toughness, or loyalty equal to the chosen number, target artifact or creature becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness X/X, where X is chosen number.

Partner

https://twitter.com/wizards_magic/status/1573839707557056514

item.title: [unf] Nocturno of Myra's Marvels
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Performer

As Nocturno of Myra's Marvels enters the battlefield, choose a word with five or more letters.

Whenever you cast a spell with the chosen word in its rules text, you draw a card and you lose 2 life.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [sld] Elspeth, Knight-Errant
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Elspeth

+1: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

+1: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.

−8: You get an emblem with "Artifacts, creatures, enchantments, and lands you control have indestructible."

item.title: [unf] Make a _____ Splash
item.description:
Enchantment

Flash

When this enchantment enters the battlefield, you pay put a name sticker on it.

Whenever you put a sticker on this enchantment, tap up to X target creatures, where X is the number of u's in name sticks on this enchantment.

item.title: [unf] Starlight Spectacular
item.description:
Enchantment

Parade! — At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose creatures you control one at a time until each creature you control has been chosen. Each of those creatures gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature chosen before it. (Places everyone! The first creature in line gets +0/+0.)

https://twitter.com/MagicNoobz/status/1573454130093359122

item.title: [unf] _____ Balls of Fire
item.description:
Enchantment

When this enchantment enters the battlefield, you may put a name sticker on it.

Whenever you put a sticker on this enchantment, it deals damage equal to the number of o's in name stickers on this enchantment to any target.

https://twitter.com/Ruu_TV/status/1573492745452376064

item.title: [unf] Trivia Contest
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — An opponent choses a red card, land card, or planeswalker card, then mills a card. You have ten seconds to name something from the chosen category that starts with the same letter as the milled card. If you do, claim the prize!

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Trivia Contest and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Trivia Contest
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — An opponent choses a green card, land card, or planeswalker card, then mills a card. You have ten seconds to name something from the chosen category that starts with the same letter as the milled card. If you do, claim the prize!

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Trivia Contest and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Trivia Contest
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — An opponent choses a colorless card, land card, or planeswalker card, then mills a card. You have ten seconds to name something from the chosen category that starts with the same letter as the milled card. If you do, claim the prize!

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Trivia Contest and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Trivia Contest
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — An opponent choses a blue card, land card, or planeswalker card, then mills a card. You have ten seconds to name something from the chosen category that starts with the same letter as the milled card. If you do, claim the prize!

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Trivia Contest and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Trivia Contest
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — An opponent choses a black card, land card, or planeswalker card, then mills a card. You have ten seconds to name something from the chosen category that starts with the same letter as the milled card. If you do, claim the prize!

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Trivia Contest and open an Attraction.

item.title: [sld] Predatory Sliver
item.description:
Creature — Sliver

Sliver creatures you control get +1/+1.

item.title: [sld] Shadowborn Apostle
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

A deck can have any number of cards named Shadowborn Apostle.

{B}, Sacrifice six creatures named Shadowborn Apostle: Search your library for a Demon creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Dragon's Hoard
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, put a gold counter on Dragon's Hoard.

{T}, Remove a gold counter from Dragon's Hoard: Draw a card.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.description:

item.title: [unf] Carnival Barker

{T}: You have thirty seconds to laud a creature you control to any people outside the game. Until end of turn, that creature gains trample and haste and gets +X/+0, where X is the number of those people who appluaded. Activate only as a sorcery and only once.

item.title: [unf] Goblin Girder Gang
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Employee

Reach

Whenever you roll a result not stored on Goblin Girder Gang, you may store that result on it. When you do, Goblin Girder Gang deals 1 damage to any target without a hat.

Goblin Girder Gang gets +1/+0 for each result stored on it.

item.title: [unf] Last Voyage of the _____
item.description:
Enchantment

When this enchantment enters the battlefield, you may put a name sticker on it, then it becomes an Aura with enchant creature. Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield and attach this Aura to it.

Enchanted creatuer gets +2/+0 for each name sticker on this Aura with seven or fewer letters.

When this Aura leaves the battlefield, sacrifice enchanted creature.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, choose A through M or N through Z.

item.title: [unf] Captain Rex Nebula
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Pilot Employee

At the beginning of combat on your turn, target nonland permanent you control becomes a Vehicle artifact until end of turn. Its base power and toughness are each equal to its mana value. It has crew 2 and "Crash Land — Whenever this Vehicle deals damage, roll a six-sided die. If the result is equal to this Vehicle's mana value, it deals that much damage to any target, then sacrifice this Vehicle."

https://twitter.com/day9tv/status/1573341434752663555

item.title: [unf] Knife and Death
item.description:
Sorcery

Just a second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't move permanents.)

One at a time, throw ten cards you own from outside the game onto the playing area from a distance of at least three feet (about one meter). For each of htose cards, Knife and Death deals 1 damage to each creature or planeswalker you don't control that card is touching. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

https://twitter.com/CommandSphere/status/1573372193517576192

item.title: [unf] Monoxa, Midway Manager
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Employee

Whenever you roll a 3 or higher, Monoxa, Midway Manager gains first strike until end of turn. If the roll was 4 or higher, it gains menace until end of turn. If the roll was 5 or higher, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

{6}: Roll a six-sided die.

https://twitter.com/GavinVerhey/status/1573384084566712320

item.title: [unf] Command Performance
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose two —

• Open an attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.

• Roll to visit your Attractions.

• You get {TIX}{TIX}.

• You may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own.
